mainTitle: Pan Africa Group (PAG) Connecting Gulf and East Africa Markets
subheading: Pan Africa Group LLC (PAG) is a Dubai-based cross-border platform operating across the Gulf and East Africa. We structure partnerships, coordinate sourcing pathways, and align institutional counterparties within defined regulatory and commercial frameworks.
positioningParagraphs: PAG connects international partners, regional institutions, and independent local operators to advance structured commercial mandates across infrastructure, trade, mobility, technology, and industrial sectors.
We do not operate as a product company.
We do not position ourselves around a single vertical.
We operate as a disciplined commercial architecture layer between markets.

coreCapabilities.title: Market Entry & Partnership Structuring
coreCapabilities.description: Supporting international entities entering East Africa through structured local positioning, partner alignment, and commercial pathway design.

coreCapabilities.title: Strategic Trade & Cross-Border Sourcing
coreCapabilities.description: Coordinating supplier relationships and sourcing frameworks across Gulf-East Africa corridors.

coreCapabilities.title: Opportunity Development & Mandate Coordination
coreCapabilities.description: Identifying commercially viable mandates and aligning multi-party stakeholders within defined operating structures.

institutionalOrientationText: PAG operates within a structured governance environment aligned with its jurisdictions of incorporation and operation. For structured mandate discussions and institutional collaboration, contact our corporate office.
